query:
INSERT INTO balance_transactions (customerId, amount, balanceBefore, balanceAfter, type, description, createdAt)
SELECT 
  c.id as customerId,
  299 as amount,
  c.balance - 299 as balanceBefore,
  c.balance as balanceAfter,
  'credit' as type,
  'Recarga PIX (processamento manual)' as description,
  NOW() as createdAt
FROM customers c
WHERE c.email = 'xkelrix@gmail.com';
